greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number compositions of n where differences between neighboring parts are in {-2,2}.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n < 1 || i < 1, 0, If[n == i, 1, Sum[b[n-i, i+j], { j, {-2, 2}}]]]; a[n_] := If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n, j], {j, 1, n}]]; Table [a[n], {n, 0, 80}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 13 2013, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 08 2012
